hints: This was the year Apple Computer Company was founded
The Apple I was introduced this year
Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne founded the company in 1976
This was the year the Macintosh was introduced
The famous '1984' Super Bowl commercial aired this year
The first Mac was released in 1984
This was the year Steve Jobs was forced out of Apple
John Sculley became CEO this year
Jobs left Apple in 1985
This was the year Apple acquired NeXT
Steve Jobs returned to Apple this year
Jobs came back to Apple in 1997
This was the year the iMac G3 was introduced
It marked the beginning of Apple's comeback
The colorful iMac was released in 1998
This was the year the iPod was introduced
It revolutionized the music industry
The first iPod was released in 2001
This was the year the iTunes Store was launched
It changed how people purchase and consume music
The iTunes Store opened in 2003
This was the year Apple switched from PowerPC to Intel processors
It marked a significant change in Mac hardware
The transition to Intel began in 2005
This was the year the iPhone was introduced
It revolutionized the smartphone industry
The first iPhone was unveiled in 2007
This was the year the App Store was launched
It created a new ecosystem for mobile applications
The App Store opened in 2008
This was the year the iPad was introduced
It defined a new category of devices between smartphones and laptops
The first iPad was released in 2010
This was the year Steve Jobs passed away
Tim Cook became CEO this year
Jobs died on October 5, 2011
This was the year Apple Watch was introduced
It marked Apple's entry into the wearable technology market
The Apple Watch was unveiled in 2014
This was the year Apple became the world's first trillion-dollar company
It marked a significant milestone in Apple's financial history
Apple reached this valuation in 2018
This was the year Apple announced its transition from Intel to Apple Silicon
It marked the beginning of a new era for Mac hardware
The transition was announced in 2020
